messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

http://codereview.appspot.com/5475060/diff/1002/doc/Makefile
File doc/Makefile (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5475060/diff/1002/doc/Makefile#newcode11
doc/Makefile:11: all: tmpltohtml go_tutorial.html effective_go.html go1.html articles/defer_panic_recover.html articles/error_handling.html
make this multi-line with backslashes

http://codereview.appspot.com/5475060/diff/1002/doc/progs/run
File doc/progs/run (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5475060/diff/1002/doc/progs/run#newcode38
doc/progs/run:38: error4.go
you don't want to run any of these, or the defer ones?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5475060/diff/1002/doc/Makefile
File doc/Makefile (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5475060/diff/1002/doc/Makefile#newcode11
doc/Makefile:11: all: tmpltohtml go_tutorial.html effective_go.html go1.html articles/defer_panic_recover.html articles/error_handling.html
On 2011/12/12 17:56:40, r wrote:
> make this multi-line with backslashes

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5475060/diff/1002/doc/progs/run
File doc/progs/run (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5475060/diff/1002/doc/progs/run#newcode38
doc/progs/run:38: error4.go
On 2011/12/12 17:56:40, r wrote:
> you don't want to run any of these, or the defer ones?

Good point. I think these ones are okay as-is, but I'll send a separate CL to run the defer ones.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a9d73de3335e ***
